scripts.copy:mosaic: rm -r assets/images/mosaics/mosaics && rm -r assets/images/mosaics/thumbnails && cp -r libs/dota-mosaic/mosaics assets/images/mosaics/mosaics && cp -r libs/dota-mosaic/thumbnails assets/images/mosaics/thumbnails
scripts.build:js: npm run browserify -- production && npm run uglify
scripts.build:css: npm run sass && npm run postcss && npm run cleancss
scripts.build: npm run build:js && npm run build:css
scripts.watch:css: nodemon -e scss --watch src/scss -x "npm run sass && cp ./assets/css/site.css ./build/media/css/site.css"
scripts.watch: npm run watch:js & npm run watch:css
scripts.hyde:prod: hyde gen -c site-prod.yaml -r -d deploy/`git rev-parse --short HEAD`
scripts.assets:update: npm run copy:dota-json && npm run copy:spritesheet && npm run copy:mosaic
scripts.assets: npm run assets:update && npm run assets:rev
scripts.gen:dev: npm run build && npm run assets && npm run data && npm run hyde:dev
scripts.gen:prod: npm run build && npm run assets && npm run data && npm run hyde:prod
